promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young rare dragon water-type pokemon holding a ornate staff. It can be found in lake-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or dragon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Staffsquirt, a a chibi young rare dragon water-type pokemon. It can be found in lake-like environments It has the following abilities: Frost Stone, Dangerous Concert. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragon", "water" or "Staffsquirt". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, dragon-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, gleaming bubble background
generatedDescription: "Nestled in serene lakes, petite Staffsquirt masterfully utilizes Frost Stone to freeze prey and orchestrates Dangerous Concert to warn others."
